Name: Hot And Lovely ：Charm
About the game: Click on the picture to enter the discord official community Game introduction Game background: Ladies and sisters have become busy at work recently, but they have trouble because they can't remember some things, so they are anxious to find a new work partner, and the first requirement for this job interview is: memory ability ! Don't underestimate this ability, it's the foundation of everything~ So now the question is, are you willing to accept this challenge? How to play: You need to memorize the different pictures by flipping the cards and find the same pictures to eliminate. Players can check the numbers by clicking on the cards in the game. When two cards with the same number are opened at the same time, the cards will disappear. When all the cards are eliminated, the level is successfully passed. Game Features: Casual and interesting game mechanics Modern style setting Multiple exquisite CG Multiple interactive gameplay Skip with one click List of characters You Yin senior is very beautiful and gentle, but the deepest impression is 'poor drinking' When drunk, she will directly transform into a coquettish and cute girl, which is too shocking! Asking her to drink often seems to be a bit malicious, but doesn't she like it very much? Si Yuan was the senior who took care of you the most since you first entered the company She is so glamorous but unexpectedly caring, occasionally harsh but giving more help and care Although the seniors are always talking hard, but the body is still very honest~ About us Because we want to provide you with a more convenient gaming experience, we have launched the official website of Lovely Games, you can click to visit the website to get the latest information! If you encounter any problems in the game, you can also choose to raise them in the F&Q discussion in the community or in the official steam group~ Thanks for the love.
